attributes.action: put the Home Secretary, Jacqui Smith, out of her misery by letting her 'spend more time with the family'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jacqui Smith has, ever since her appointment as Home Secretary, proved herself to be as out of her depth in her role as the Prime Minister is in his. It is time the Government undid this obvious case of positive discrimination by allowing the Home Secretary to 'spend more time with the family'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
